boardgame.name: Campioni di midgard
Champions de Midgard
Champions of Midgard
Wojownicy Midgardu
Чемпионы Мидгарда
boardgame.description: Champions of Midgard is a middleweight, Viking-themed, worker placement game with dice rolling in which players are leaders of Viking clans who have traveled to an embattled Viking harbor town to help defend it against the threat of trolls, draugr, and other mythological Norse beasts. By defeating these epic creatures, players gain glory and the favor of the gods. When the game ends, the player who has earned the most glory earns the title of Jarl and is recognized as a champion of Midgard!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Placing workers allows for the collection of resources and warriors, which players may then send on journeys to neighboring villages or across the sea to defeat monsters and gain the glory they need for victory. Resources are used to carve runes, build ships, and feed your followers. Viking warriors (custom dice) do battle with the myriad enemies the town faces._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Grey Fox Games (GFX96736) Trolls attack your town. Draugr terrorize nearby villages. Monsters strike at travelers and merchants alike. The people are suffering - will you be their champion? Champions of Midgard is a Viking era worker placement game with dice-driven combat. Taking on the roles of competing Viking leaders, players hunt trolls, battle draugr, and slay mythical Norse beasts in a quest for glory!

Base game in original box (appears to be 3rd printing based on direct comparison to rulebook download) PLUS the Special Edition Big Box which includes the Valhalla and The Dark Mountains expansions plus custom Viking meeples and some promo cards. Base game was played once. Expansions were never played. Everything is practically like new. Both boxes with packing materials is about 10 pounds. Shipping to along the east cost down to about VA should be $12 or less. Shipping west of PA increases the shipping with substantial increases in cost the more westward your location. Local pick up/delivery is possible for southern NH, eastern MA, and southern ME along the southern I95 corridor.
